title: State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, Lies - Collection26 (Israel6)
description:
State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - Collection 26 (Israel 6):

We have 35 titles here:

-  Abu El-Haj - Facts on the Ground; Archaeological Practice and Territorial Self-Fashioning in Israeli Society (2001)

-  Amnesty Int. - Nothing Is Immune; Israel's Destruction of Landmark Buildings in Gaza (2014)

-  Bayoumi (Ed.) - Midnight on the Navi Marmara; the Attack on the Gaza Freedom Flotilla .. (2010)

-  Blumenthal - The 51 Day War; Ruin and Resistance in Gaza (2015)

-  Bregman - Cursed Victory; a History of Israel and the Occupied Territories (2014)

-  Brenner (Ed.) - 51 Documents; Zionist Collaboration with the Nazis (2002)

-  Cromer - A War of Words; Political Violence and Public Debate in Israel (2004)

-  Darwish - Unfortunately, It Was Paradise; Selected Poems (2003)

-  Falk - Israel's 50 Day Attack on Gaza, POMEAS (Nov. 2014)

-  Finkelstein - Method and Madness; the Hidden Story of Israel's Assaults on Gaza (2014)

-  Gazit - Trapped Fools; Thirty Years of Israeli Policy in the Territories (2003)

-  Hallward - Struggling for a Just Peace; Israeli and Palestinian Activism in the Second Intifada (2011)

-  HRW - Ripe for Abuse; Palestinian Child Labor in Israeli Agricultural Settlements in the West Bank (2015)

-  Jenkins - Pictures of Palestine; a Humanitarian Blogging from Bethlehem (2012)

-  Karsh - Palestine Betrayed (2010)

-  Karsh (Ed.) - From Rabin to Netanyahu; Israel's Troubled Agenda (1997)

-  Katibah (Ed.) - The Case Against Zionism (1921)

-  Kolsky - Jews Against Zionism; the American Council for Judaism, 1942-1948 (1990)

-  Lentin (Ed.) - Thinking Palestine (2008)

-  Levy - The Punishment of Gaza (2010)

-  Malek & Hoke (Eds.) - Palestine Speaks; Narrative of Life Under Occupation (2014)

-  Murphy - Between River and Sea; Encounters in Israel and Palestine (2015)

-  Nakhleh - Encyclopedia of the Palestine Problem, Vol. I (1991)

-  Olberg - Political Graffiti on the West Bank Wall in Israel-Palestine (2013)

-  O'Malley - The Two-State Delusion; Israel and Palestine - a Tale of Two Narratives (2015)

-  Piggott - An Ideal Betrayed; Australia, Britain and the Palestine Question, 1947-1949, a PhD Thesis, Univ. of Sydney (2002)

-  Ranta - Political Decision Making and Non-Decisions; the Case of Israel and the Occupied Territories (2015)

-  Rosengarten - Survival and Conscience; From the Shadows of Nazi Germany to the Jewish Boat to Gaza (2015)

-  Rothchild - Broken Promises, Broken Dreams; Stories of Jewish and Palestinian Trauma and Resilience (2007)

-  Sa'di & Abu-Lughod (Eds.) - Nakba; Palestine, 1948, and the Claims of Memory (2007)

-  Sager - Travels with Bassem; a Palestinian and a Jew Find Friendship in a War-Torn Land (2015)

-  Sand - How I Stopped Being a Jew (2014)

-  Sand - The Invention of the Land of Israel; from Holy Land to Homeland (2012)

-  Shipler - Arab and Jew; Wounded Spirits in a Promised Land (2002)

-  Sternhell - The Founding Myths of Israel; Nationalism, Socialism, and the Making of the Jewish State (1998)
